application.name: Borg ER-3
application.summary: Tone generator inspired by the Korg ER-1

description.p: Fixed-state modular synthesizer using FART oscillators, if you can hold back the chuckles for a moment stands for Frequency, Amplitude, Resolution, and Transformation oscillators, the resolution regards harmonic resolution and transformation regards the wave-shape being produced by the oscillator.
The envelope can be clicked and dragged into any shape, the biquads can be manually configured on a per coefficient basis, they are executed in sequential order so BIQUAD 1 executes first.
